    • insert_staff

      public void insert_staff(String ic, String id, String name, String phone, String email)
      This method is used to insert the staff details into the database.
      Parameters:
      ic - the ic number of the staff
      id - the staff id number
      name - the name of the staff
      phone - the phone number of the staff
      email - the email address of the staff

    • insert_booking

      public void insert_booking(String purpose, String date, String time, String room_id, String staff_id)
      This method is used to insert the booking details into the database.
      Parameters:
      purpose - the purpose of booking a meeting room
      date - the booking date
      time - the booking time
      room_id - the desired room id that wish to book
      staff_id - the staff id number
